constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 187 (Monday, October 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 5710.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to Amendment 4 and Amendment 14, Section 5 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H5873]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Preventing Vigilante Stalking that Stops Women’s Access to Healthcare and Abortion Rights Act of 2021
